work.title: WORK
work.intro: I'm Nguyen Quang Hieu, a software developer with 5 years of experience.
work.description: Back in my school days, I used to wonder: "How do people create such stunning websites with beautiful effects?" That curiosity sparked my passion for web development — and right after graduating from high school, I decided to pursue this path. Five years later, that same curiosity still drives me every day. I strive not just to write cleaner code, but to turn each line into an experience a story that connects people through technology. For me, programming isn't just a job; it's a journey of growth, creativity, and endless learning.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: After years of working with the web, I've realized that what keeps me passionate isn't just writing code — it's how technology connects people and creates real value in the digital world. I'm now looking for a stable environment where I can continue to grow with Vue.js, while expanding further into fullstack development based on the foundation I've built over the years. If your team is still looking for the right piece to complete the puzzle, feel free to reach out — not just to talk about experience, but to see whether our ways of thinking and working truly align.
